name: Lost Vault
description:
Story:

... Years ago was a devastating nuclear war, that almost erase an etire population on earth. 

the last group of people survived in a vault.

This bunker has its own nuclear reactor that is old and needs permanent maintenance. 

You’re one of the stuff who should carefully watch the reactor. 

[because reactor... reactor never changes.] 

GLHF.

Contol :video_game: 

WASD - movement;

Mouse - look around;

Click - Interact with items;

Esc - Pause/Exit panels

Welp...
